tower_intro.dialogue: And you must be Mr. Hugh Mann… But you’re a goblin. And you’re alone…?
Hugh Mann Interior Planning and Construction is a one-man job.
Alright then… Sorry for being so rude. The name just caught me off-guard.
Well, those are my specialty. You’ve found the right man.
Can you come to X Tower at Y street tomorrow? We’re in a bit of a hurry, as you can tell....
Wait, aren’t you going to ask for a price?
Well, our real estate agent said you’d give us a fair price no matter what.

tower_scene_egg.dialogue: It’s hard and smooth, but is really light and probably hollow inside.
Oh my birb! It’s an egg!
Sorry, the way my daughter talks is rubbing off on me.
Daughter? Aren’t you moving in to nest?
She’s a teenager now. We want to nest again.
Anyways, who could’ve left their precious egg behind like this?
You haven’t met the previous owner?
You sure you’re not being scammed by your agent?
No, wait, that’s not important right now! This is an egg! Someone must be desperately looking for it.
Alright. You wait here. And take care of that egg. I’ll go look for clues while cleaning.
You’re going to clean now? Doesn’t that take days?

tower_scene_incubator.dialogue: Normally leftover belongings should be thrown away…
But I should probably keep this to show to Sierra.

tower_scene_paint_can.dialogue: It’s a can of paint… and it’s the same color as the egg.
Seems mighty suspicious. I’ll take it to Sierra.

tower_scene_ending_1.dialogue: I’m done cleaning up, and I’ve found some clues.
This here is an Incubator. But it seems much too small for the egg.
And this here is a can of paint that looks suspiciously like the color of the egg.
That does seem odd… But I feel like I should know an egg when I see one.
I could be wrong, though. What do you think, Mr. Mann?
I think you're right. It is an egg..
Yes! The owner must've bought the wrong size incubator by mistake.
And the paint color is just a coincidence.
Still, it seems to have been here a while and is awfully cold...
You can never be too certain... I'll send it along to an egg-spert I know.

tower_scene_ending_2.dialogue: I’m done cleaning up, but I didn’t find too many clues.
That’s … not good. This is probably an abandoned egg, then.
And this tower is an abandoned nest.
It’s probably a bad omen to move into a place like this...
But for this price… I don’t think I should complain.
You’re right on that one. Being cheap is being wise.
(That doesn't give me much confidence in your handiwork…)
